title: Update Chess.com product (logo, 1 Year duration, BDT pricing) and refresh official logos for major services

requirements.text: Update the Chess.com Diamond Membership product configuration in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` to: (1) use the exact remote logo URL `https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/AP1GczPrM5qCg1h5oVf-E-Y7O_9G9-o8yN_2m_7v-S_w-O_z-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w=w256-h256` as the primary image, (2) change its duration from the currently hardcoded monthly duration to a single selectable duration labeled exactly "1 Year", and (3) set pricing to regular 1200 BDT and offer 970 BDT (offer price is used for totals).

quotes: Logo: Use this exact image URL for Chess.com: https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/AP1GczPrM5qCg1h5oVf-E-Y7O_9G9-o8yN_2m_7v-S_w-O_z-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w-F_w=w256-h256
Duration Change: Change the quantity/duration option for Chess.com to '1 Year' instead of months.
Pricing: Regular price 1200 BDT, Offer price 970 BDT.

acceptanceCriteria: Chess.com card shows crossed-out regular price "BDT 1200" and current/offer price "BDT 970".
Chess.com card’s total price calculation uses offer price (970) × quantity and displays as "BDT" (not "Tk") for Chess.com.
Chess.com product has a single duration option labeled exactly "1 Year" (no month-based label shown for Chess.com).
Clicking Chess.com “Buy It Now” opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message containing Product name, Duration: 1 Year, Quantity, and Total in BDT.
Adding Chess.com to cart stores duration as "1 Year" and cart UI/checkout message shows "1 Year" (not "1 Month") for that item.

requirements.text: Implement robust Chess.com logo fallback behavior in `frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx`: if the remote Chess.com logo URL fails to load, automatically fall back to a locally hosted static image under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (without showing a broken image icon).

quotes: (Note: If this URL doesn't work, please upload the image file to your site's assets and use that path).

acceptanceCriteria: When the Chess.com remote image fails to load (simulated by blocking the URL), the product card displays the local fallback image from `/assets/generated/...` instead of the letter placeholder or a broken image.
When the remote URL loads successfully, the local fallback is not used.
All user-facing alt text remains in English.

requirements.text: Refresh the product logos for Netflix, Spotify, and YouTube Premium to use official high-resolution branding logos (not generic icons or old banners), and ensure the product data references those updated assets consistently.

quotes: For all other subscription services (Netflix, Spotify, YouTube Premium), automatically fetch and use their official high-resolution branding logos instead of generic icons or old banners.

acceptanceCriteria: Netflix, Spotify, and YouTube Premium cards display official, high-resolution logos with transparent/clean backgrounds suitable for the premium dark theme.
The logo assets are served as static files from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and referenced via stable `/assets/generated/...` paths in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx`.
No external runtime dependency is required to render these three logos (i.e., the logos still render when offline once the app is loaded).

requirements.text: Ensure product-card interaction consistency across all products: quantity "+" and "-" buttons work reliably (minimum quantity 1) and "Buy It Now" opens WhatsApp chat for priced products using `https://wa.me/8801326060586` with a pre-filled English message. Do not degrade the existing premium dark styling.

quotes: Ensure all product cards have the same premium dark style, working '+' and '-' quantity buttons, and a functional 'Buy it now' button linked to WhatsApp 8801326060586.

acceptanceCriteria: All product cards retain consistent premium dark styling (cards, badges, typography, and buttons).
Quantity decrement never goes below 1; increment always increases quantity.
For priced products, “Buy It Now” opens `https://wa.me/8801326060586?text=...` in a new tab with an English pre-filled message including Product, Duration, Quantity, and Total.
For unpriced products, the existing WhatsApp inquiry flow remains functional and does not show numeric pricing.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Backend must remain single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
Adding a new database or external storage layer for products/logos.

edits: Replace with official high-resolution Netflix branding logo (netflix-logo.dim_512x512.png > netflix-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Replace with official high-resolution Spotify branding logo (spotify-logo.dim_512x512.png > spotify-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Replace with official high-resolution YouTube Premium branding logo (youtube-logo.dim_512x512.png > youtube-logo.dim_512x512.png)
